message.b: Welcome to the Media Encoding Cluster Setup

messages.message:
Select Mode
Please select the Mode in which this Instance will run, it can be Server Mode and/or Client Mode.
- Server Mode, this instance will act as the Cluster Server which control the Encoding Tasks.
- Client Mode, this instance will be the Encoding Worker and put/get Data from the Server

Configure Database Connection
Please type in the Connection Parameter for the Database Server.

Configure Database Connection Setup
In this version of the Media Encoding Cluster, there is no need to configure the Database Connection because the Database is Embedded into the Media Encoding Cluster.
NOTE: The embedded Server makes System under Heavy CPU Load, but it is currently the only option!

Configure Client
Please type in the Connection Parameter for the Client to connect to the Server Host.

Configure Hive
Please type in the Connection Parameter for the Database Server.

Configure Admin Account
Please type in the Connection Parameter for the Database Server.
